title: WTT: My T205 Polar Bear Barger, Full B, for your T205/T206 Sovereign

posts.post_title: WTT: My T205 Polar Bear Barger, Full B, for your T205/T206 Sovereign
posts.post_content:
Anybody interested in a trade for a similar Sovereign?  Any Sovereign...not just a Barger.  Let me know what you have!

Cheers,
Geno

[IMG]https://farm2.staticflickr.com/1832/43049940225_2297fd1a18_z.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]https://farm2.staticflickr.com/1798/43955094971_5e9dd7378b_z.jpg[/IMG]
Since I'm not getting too many views on this, he's headed to the auction block...see you there!
